```{r, load_library}
library(Rarr)
```

```{r, read-from-s3}
s3_address = "https://uk1s3.embassy.ebi.ac.uk/idr/zarr/v0.4/idr0101A/13457539.zarr/1"
z2 <- read_zarr_array(s3_address)
```
